event_text: m_c was grabbed by a hawk, but luckily r_c saves them! The kit is still left injured from the ordeal.
history_text: m_c was scarred as a kit when an hawk tried to take them.
m_c died from their wounds after an hawk tried to take them.

event_text: m_c snuck out of camp and returned cold and shivering, frostbite nipping at their paws.
history_text: m_c was permanently scarred by frostbite.
m_c died from frostbite after sneaking out of camp.
